actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House with respect to the allocation of necessary energy sources to the travel and tourism industry.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House that Federal departments and agencies should consider providing adequate energy supplies to all segments of the travel and tourism industry in any allocation of energy supplies or other action to alleviate the energy shortage.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House with respect to the allocation of necessary energy sources to the travel and tourism industry.
